backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, ordered maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, activity tracking, and various supporting types.
feature_evidence.json: Contains metadata describing a feature evidence report linking a frontend React Query update to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of multiple frontend React components and pages used across the application.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Provides deployment instructions for building and deploying the Ribbit app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point that loads the frontend root and initializes the React application.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Bash script automating backend binding generation, frontend build, and canister deployment with error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, and route tree for all main application pages.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Button component that toggles bookmark state for a lily using useBookmarks.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a comment with avatar, metadata, content, and optional like/reply interactions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Displays emoji-based reaction buttons with counts, hover effects, and click handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays the site footer with navigation links and attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main site header with search, navigation, user avatar, and responsive mobile/desktop interactions including dropdowns and modals.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the global page layout with header, footer, routed content, and a mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the left navigation sidebar with links and recent activity items, highlighting active routes and supporting mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post card with avatar, metadata, counts, image, and actions such as like, share, and bookmark.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Shows an image with a fixed aspect ratio, adding a blurred backdrop for non-4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Provides a mobile slide‑in drawer containing the left sidebar and manages body scroll lock and overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed pond information including stats, moderators, visibility, and join/leave controls.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Renders a join button for pond cards, handling join actions and disabled state for existing members.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Responsive mobile header for a pond page showing banner, profile image, name, description, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with voting, metadata, preview content or image, tags, and links to the pond and full post.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user's ribbit in their profile with avatar, timestamp, content, and link to the related lily conversation.
Popover emoji picker that lets users insert preset emojis via a selection callback.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Shows a ribbit with avatar, timestamp, likes, and threaded replies, including reply form and like handling.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads an avatar with a blurred placeholder and smooth transition, usable as an img or AvatarImage component.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent high‑view posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending searches, suggestions, and handling query input.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under a search bar with trending searches and suggestions based on the current query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar for tag hub pages listing top, trending, and newest tags with activity counts.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers for TabsList and TabsTrigger with underline-specific classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs in localStorage with helpers to add, remove, toggle, and retrieve them.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Evaluates a CSS media query and updates when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, lilies, profiles, and related data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus light and dark theme CSS variables and utility classes for UI behaviors and sizing.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notation like k, M, or B with basic rounding.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client‑side image validation, resizing, and compression with special handling for animated GIFs.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric format and returns related error messages.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lily count, member count, and name, returning a map of ranks.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily via Web Share API or falls back to clipboard copy with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns error messages for invalid input.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identifiers, usernames, and Froggy Phrase backup/restore using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per‑lily cooldown tracking in localStorage to limit view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing the Ribbit platform, features, and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with loading states, ranking, membership status, and links to create or visit ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating a lily with text, image, or link types, tag suggestions, image compression, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a pond with name validation, description, images, and automated image compression and preview.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Creates a text, image, or link post with pond selection, image compression, validation, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, avatar, posts, and comments with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home feed of lilies with search, sorting, loading states, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily with comments, likes, view tracking, and ribbit creation.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Renders detailed pond info including moderators, visibility, join/leave actions, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed with its banner, sidebar layout, and sorted lilies.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Shows a post with its content, metadata, and threaded comments, allowing new comment creation.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading/error states and removal support.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Page displaying top, trending, and newest tags with loading states and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Tag detail page that resolves canonical tags, lists lilies with sorting, and shows subcategories.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: User settings interface for username changes, profile editing, avatar upload, pond management, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors, radius, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing Step 3 migration to phrase-hash UserId with pending related feature requests.
